item.description:
Last time it was fun at the Five Horses Tavern, but the setting was not the best to interact with everyone. Also music was a bit loud to talk.

The Diesel cafe has a lot of room to sit, move around, and also play pool. They don't serve alcohol, but good inexpensive food and other beverages. Full menu available HERE

Take the T to Davis Sq. (Red Line) in Somerville, it is a 2 min. walk from there. Plenty of parking available.

 

Please Note: this month we are holding the meetup on Wednesday evening.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the back by the pool tables, I'll send my cell number the day before

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Monthly Conversations between native and non-native English speakers
